thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Irene Lau
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Irene Lau

author: Irene Lau
title: Irene Lau
text:
The car was comfortable and easy to drive. It was hot driving from Queenstown and I couldn't get the air conditioner temperature up. The concert programme was hard to find on the radio so I gave up turning radio on altogether.
Returning the car I had to find a BP petrol station and was directed across the road from Omega Depot. It was very nice of the one man who manned the Depot to wait for me to go to airport even though he had another customer to pick up at the airport.
